name: Mystical Samurai Bloodbath
description:
Mystical Samurai Bloodbath was a one week challenge to create a game based on the following name: Mystical Samurai Bloodbath. This game is a local fighting game were two players fight each other to death. Only one can prevail.

The player not only has to look out for their Health but also for their stamina. Both players has three fighting stances and each stance has effective against one stance and weak against the other stance. Deciding which stance for the situation is important for this game.

Command

Player 1

Player 2

Attack

W

Arrow Up

Defend

S

Arrow Down

Movement

A/D

Arrow Left/Right

Change Fighting Stance

Space

Left Ctrl

  Enyoj the game.
